title: RADS Error
body:
Could not connect to the HTTP server. Please check that your Internet connection is enabled and that your firewall is not blocking access.
This just popped up on my computer and have tried every possible way to fix it and my mates just had the same issue as he downloaded league.
I'M IN A GAME TOO BTW IT HASN'T FINISHED AND I'D LIKE MY LOSS PREVENTION AT LEAST BECAUSE THIS ISN'T ON MY END

replies.body:
>This just popped up on my computer and have tried every possible way to fix it and my mates just had the same issue as he downloaded league.

What have you tried so far?
Are you still experiencing the issue?
